rukus.text: 79|1|Savgand ʙa faristagone, ki con [-i kofiron]-ro ʙa siddat ʙerun mekasand
79|2|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki con [-i mu'minon]-ro ʙa narmi va osoni megirand
79|3|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki [ʙa amri Alloh taolo az osmon ʙa suji zamin] sinovarand
79|4|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki [dar icroi avomiri ilohi] ʙar jakdigar saʙqat megirand
79|5|Va savgand ʙa faristagone [ki ʙa amri ilohi] korhoro tadʙir mekunand
79|6|Ruze, ki [pas az avvalin damidan dar sur] zamin [va kuhho va hama ciz] ʙa larza darojad
79|7|[Va] Dar paji on [damidani duvumi hasr] ʙijojad
79|8|Dar on ruz dilhoe saxt muztariʙ [va tarson] ast
79|9|Va casmhoi onon [az tarsu sarmsori] furu aftodaast
79|10|[Kofiron dar dunjo] Megujand: «Ojo mo [pas az marg duʙora] ʙa holi avvali xud ʙozgardonda mesavem
79|11|Ojo hangome ki ustuxonhoi pusida sudem [va ʙa xok taʙdil gastem, ʙoz ham zinda mesavem]?»
79|12|Gujand: «[Agar cunin va'dae durust ʙosad] on goh on ʙozgaste zijonʙor ast»
79|13|Pas on [ʙozgast] tanho ʙo jak ʙongi ʙohajʙat ast
79|14|Va nogahon hamagi ʙar arsai zamin [-i mahsar] zohir] mesavand
79|15|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo dostoni Muso ʙa tu rasidaast
79|16|On goh ki Parvardigoras uro dar sarzamini muqaddasi «Tuvo» nido dod [va farmud]
79|17|«Ba sui Fir'avn ʙirav, ki u tuƣjon kardaast
79|18|Va ʙa u ʙigu: «Ojo mexohi [az kufru gunoh] pok savi
79|19|Va man turo ʙa suji Parvardigorat hidojat kunam, to [az U] ʙitarsi [va farmonʙardor savi]
79|20|Pas, [Muso] mu'cizai ʙuzurgro ʙa u nison dod
79|21|Ammo u takziʙu sarkasi kard
79|22|Sipas pust kard va ʙa kusisu talos [alajhi u] pardoxt
79|23|Pas, [qavmasro] cam' kardu nido dod
79|24|Va guft: «Man Parvardigori ʙartari sumo hastam»
79|25|Pas, Alloh taolo uro ʙa azoʙi oxirat va dunjo giriftor kard
79|26|Be gumon, dar in [voqea] ʙaroi har kas, ki [az Alloh taolo] metarsad, iʙrate hast
